runs.comm: length ball, outside off, angling away, and left alone
back of a length, angling across, Butt looks to drive, but gets a bottom edge towards the bowler

he has cleaned him up, what a choice for the first over ahead of Malinga - Mathews pitches it up again, Butt goes for the big drive, foot nowhere close to the ball, and it takes out the off, hint of swing there, down the slope
length ball, just outside off, defended back to the bowler
length ball, outside off, driven on the up, wide of Murali at mid-off, and gets one
back of a length, just outside off, cut towards point
back of a length, Malik walks across, and plays it to cover
this one nipped into the right-hander, with the slope again, but Malik has walked outside off, taking the lbw out of question
back of a length, into his body, turned away to fine leg for one
length ball, Akmal looks to push it off the back foot, gets the inside half of the bat
gets another inside edge, pushing without any foot movement, but this one will be one to fine leg
Malik steps down as if to a spinner, and although this is a mis-hit he gets enough on it to get four
length ball, Akmal goes aerial, gets the toe end, but just clears mid-off
back of a length, accurate, Malik defends off the back foot
throws it wide, Malik frees his arms, but the movement away beats him
short but not short enough to cut, beats Malik on the cut, Sangakkara standing up seems to be doing the trick as Malik hasn't used his feet since
four dots in a row, length ball outside off, and he looks to drive without feet, no power in this
finally Malik slogs, gets a thick top edge, and this one clears short third man
short and wide, Akmal looks to pull, this one stays low a bit as he plays all over it
tucks him up with a short one, he still manages to pull, but gets just one to deep backward square
Sangakkara stays back this time, and Malik uses his feet, moving outside the line, making room and throwing his arms at it, clears cover and gets four
gives him a dummy back-away movement, then looks to move inside the line, but Kulasekera keeps it straight, only one to square leg
superb yorker, on leg stump, dug out back to the bowler
slower ball, Akmal slogs, but gets too close to the pitch, and hits it straight to mid-off - it's so fast they can't get even one
back of a length, hit powerfully, but can't beat mid-off
cracking shot, Malik uses his feet again, walks across, this is short and wide, and he flashes at it, finding the gap between third man and point, both deep
same shot, short and wide again, this time he stands still and hits powerfully with an open face, misfielded by Jayawardene at gully
another boundary, it's short again, and he flashes at it, going in the air this time, and it's placed perfectly between third man and deep point
this time he goes full, but stays wide, and he plays it with an open face, square of third man, and gets two
gets away with it Mathews, has the cover fielder to thank, full and wide, Malik drives it powerfully, but cover dives and gets a hand onto it, keeping them down to one
almost took the leg stump out with the slower offcutter, saw Malik moving across, bowls the loopy one, beats him, the ball pitches in front of stumps and breaks away

another slower delivery, and it's a wicket this time, Malik slogs at this one outside off, 124ks, gets the inside half, and lobs this one straight to mid-on. Seems Malik had made his mind there was something special required to put Malinga off his rhythm
short, just wide, Younis looks to open his face, somehow keeps it down

and then there were two, superb slower delivery, Akmal's feet don't move, he lobs this one from in front of his body towards midwicket. Although this one doesn't carry to the fielder, Akmal is late to start on the one, Silva keeps his cool and under-arms it, a desperate dive is not enough for Akmal
slower ball again, dipping on Younis, still a fulltoss, and turned to fine leg for one
gives him a nice little bouncer first up, Misbah seems surprised, lets it go
slower ball again, just outside off, and played towards square leg
beats him outside off, back of a length and moving away
short and wide, cut away for one

Misbah walks across, Mathews digs it in, defended off the front foot, and they go through for one, Mathews does well to field and run the stumps down at non-striker's end down. The ball hits the stumps when the bat is on the line, but the bat slides in by the time bails come off
back of a length, played towards cover off the back foot
this one seams in, so far Mathews has moved it away, down the slope, but this one comes in from back of a length, and beats Younis
short and wide, cut away by Younis, but straight into the ground, and he can't get the single because Dilshan at point is alert. Good spell from Mathews
topspinner right away, Misbah stays back, and turns it around the corner
Younis loves to sweep, which is what he does now, and gets a safe two to deep backward square
sweeps again, from outside off, and gets only one this time
another toppie, Misbah stays back again, and defends it back to Murali
big offbreak this time, a touch short, and hence an easy single to long-on
swept from in front of stumps, and gets one again
starts accurately, flat, short, straight, single down to long-off
sees the googly perhaps, gets his front foot outside the line, and paddles it fine
carrom ball tried, but no break here, played down the ground for one
short, moves away a touch, cut away to sweeper-cover
slowed it up this time, taken from outside off, for one to deep backward square
short, not much turn again, and cut away for one
round the wicket to Younis, swept away for one
good reverse-sweep, Jayasuriya sees Misbah switching and slows it up, Misbah waits for it, and nudges it fine of third man
down the leg side
back of a length, on the stumps, turned around the corner
sweeps, sweeps well, fine of deep backward square leg
quicker, shorter, played for one down the ground
fuller, slower, played straight to midwicket
Younis stays with the sweep, this one is particularly good, flat and in front of square
driven into the off side, and a misfield at cover means they get two
short and wide, cut away to sweeper-cover
the first time Mendis has got appreciable turn, starts off and breaks away, defended to cover
full, driven down the ground for one
flighted outside off, and he gets one to long-off
and Younis sweeps again, superbly this time, picked the doosra, rolled his wrists over it, finds the gap between square leg and midwicket
sweeps again, can't find the gap this time, will be one
topspinner, Misbah stays back, turns it around with soft hands, and comes through for two
another toppie, Misbah looks to go inside the line, but the ball follows him, no room either side
tries the doosra, but this is a low fulltoss outside leg, he sweeps fine, but Mubarak uses all his height to dive and save three there
Younis sweeps again, this time to left of Mubarak at short fine
slower bouncer, beats him comprehensively, 127ks
proper fast yorker, gets one down to long-on
another slower ball now, 125ks, beats Misbah outside the off stump
tires the slower ball again, but this is a fulltoss, Misbah walks inside the line and turns it away to midwicket
big shout, straight, fast yorker, Misbah walking across, gets an inside edge, though, and to the annoyance of Sangakkara picks two
length ball, outside off, played straight to cover
lame fulltoss, Younis sweeps him, perfect placement again, bisecting the two deep men square. Younis is keeping Pakistan in
steps out, Murali pulls the length back, Younis recovers to hit it down the ground for one
full, on the stumps, turned away to the on side
short, and pulled away, to wide of long-on
gets a top edge on the sweep, the first time he has mis-hit that shot, but this one doesn't carry to deep backward square
full, on the stumps, played in front of his body, to midwicket
short and wide, Younis rocks back, and lofts him over extra cover. So three of the last four overs have seen first-ball fours. All Younis
full, outside off, played to just wide of long-off, and gets two, good running
back of a length, turning away from leg-stump line, gets one to long-off
Misbah backs away, Mendis stays straight, and Misbah plays straight to midwicket
second dot ball, flat, straight, no room for Misbah
flighted this time, turned around the corner for one
thrown up outside off, played with soft hands, will get one
slog-sweep this time, but there is a deep midwicket to keep him down to one

that was a good shot, but just managed to hit it at the right height for Sri Lanka, he rocks back early, pulls crisply, but finds out deep midwicket. Misbah was under pressure to get his first boundary
Boom Boom goes back to dressing room, almighty slog the first ball he faces, gets the top edge, picks out deep midwicket again
Younis sweeps the hat-trick ball for one
topspinner, on off stump, Fawad plays bwith soft hands and gets off the mark
starts with a full delivery, Fawad plays it towards third man
yorker, down the leg side, turned away well to between fine leg and deep backward square
slower ball, wide outside off, placed well between sweeper-cover and third man, to get to his fifty, a very good innings that has kept Pakistan alive

the slower ball does it again, this has to be the match, wide outside off this is, Younis is early into it, and lobs it towards short third man, Sangakkara runs and takes the catch, but there is a collision with Murali running in from third man. All safe, though
back of a length, slower ball, played for one to short third man
a superb yorker this time, just the one
fulltoss, driven down the ground
that's a good hit, a low fulltoss, he clears his leg, and lofts it over midwicket
slower delivery, angled across Alam, he swings big time, and misses
full, almost a yorker, played to point for one
that was wristily and powerfully hit, but straight to long-on for one
fulltoss, drilled down to long-on, just the one
slower ball again, back of a length, thick outside edge, one down to third man
another slower ball, and Tanvir plays all over it, this one dips sharply
this time he goes for the shorter slower one, Tanvir plays and misses again, but this one bounces twice through to Sangakkara and they get a bye
looks for the scoop shot, Malinga bowls a wide yorker, just one to short fine
another slower delivery, they are not picking him at all, beats him again with this shorter one

finishes with a wicket, another slower delivery - I'm tired of picking the slower ones - and Tanvir slogs at it, gets a huge top edge, Malinga calls for it, gets under it, and catches it on the rebound
that's a fulltoss hit hard down the ground, but long-on gets around it
yorker, inside edge onto the pads, gets one
another top edge, another swing across the line, and another easy catch for Sangakkara, what a way to delay the inevitable
fulltoss, drilled to deep midwicket, Aaamer is late to start for the second, and we have an easy run-out
Gul pulls, and pulls well, clears deep backward square
length ball, hit down the ground for one, and Sri Lanka win comfortably in the end
